name: Upper Mississippi River Valley AutoDrive
description:
This is the full AutoDrive course created by Farmer_Ed_Gaming and JanR93 for Upper Mississippi River Valley (UMRV) 4x map by DJ Modding. 

Massive thanks to DJ Modding for allowing us the chance to have the map early and get this course out and ready for release date of the map.

It has 179 Waypoints covering; All Fields, All Farms, Productions and Fill and Sell Points.

- The Franzia Winery Manual Unload point is just that; Manual Unload. It is too tight to put a course in there so have put in a one direction to the manual unload point.

Please let us know if you find anything wrong or doesn't work and we will try and get a fix done and new version uploaded as soon as is possible.

Please use the comments section or you can find us on Discord @ https://discord.gg/wWyH4GgpPP
